title: Recognize this whimsical script?
content:
Just got this email from Bucca di Beppo. I love the script of the headline. Anybody know it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12_4815.jpg)
author: letsgobuffs

comments.content: Thank you! I knew it looked familiar.

The work of one of my friends, and a regular at Typophile, Stuart Sandler.

- Mike Yanega
